title: Daily: Dogs still not barking in Panama. (But ransomware bites.)
description: In today's Daily Podcast we continue our follow-up on the Panama Papers' investigation. Ransomware, DDoS, and malvertising continue their win, place, and show finishes in the criminal sweeps. Patch Tuesday addresses Badlock and other vulnerabilities. Some M&A news in the cyber sector. And the FBI may not have used Cellebrite's services to unlock the San Bernardino jihadi's iPhone after all. Plus, Johns Hopkins' Information Security Institute's Joe Carrigan warns us about phony calls claiming to be Microsoft tech support.
itunes:author: CyberWire, Inc.
itunes:subtitle: Daily: Dogs still not barking in Panama. (But ransomware bites.)
